Text: Thanks for the upload. Are there english subtitles?

Still, i looked up Las Mil y Una Noches on imdb and it is a film from 1958. ( http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0241725/ ), so i'm still not sure what doesn't fit here: the title or the description?

If its Pasolini than presumably it is this: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0071502/.

Looking at the preview, it is Arabian Nights. I believe there are two subtitle tracks: one is Spanish and the other one Italian.
